entry.title: Re
entry.summary: Re Jake Chervinsky: "Crypto people shouldn't support Elon buying Twitter because centralization" 🙄 Meh. It's already a centralized company. Elon buying it doesn't stop anyone from building decentralized alternatives. It might make Twitter better. Liking crypto doesn't mean hating everything else.

entry.summary: Re banteg: It's sad freedom of speech has so few friends we have to rely on the benevolence and principles of a few tech billionaires like Durov and Musk. Hope we can do better one day, but for now I welcome our new Twitter overlords.

entry.title: Re
entry.summary: Re Dr. Parik Patel, BA, CFA, ACCA Esq. (drpatel.eth): For $43 billion Elon Musk could’ve given every person in the world a million dollars and still had $37 billion left over. Instead he decided to buy Twitter. Shameful.
